reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 82/07: PRE-ELECTION REPORT FOR 2007 PROVINCIAL ELECTION

content.content: 1. (1) A pre-election report under subsection 10 (1) of the Act is required in connection with the 2007 provincial election. O. Reg. 82/07, s. 1 (1). (2) The deadline for the release of the pre-election report is 30 days after the day on which the Minister of Finance moves the Budget motion in 2007 under Standing Order 57 (a) of the Standing Orders of the Assembly. O. Reg. 82/07, s. 1 (2). Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A pre-election report under subsection 10 (1) of the Act is required in connection with the 2007 provincial election. O. Reg. 82/07, s. 1 (1).

(2) The deadline for the release of the pre-election report is 30 days after the day on which the Minister of Finance moves the Budget motion in 2007 under Standing Order 57 (a) of the Standing Orders of the Assembly. O. Reg. 82/07, s. 1 (2).

Français
